name: Wild West Quickdraw Duel
description: In Quickdraw Duel, you are rewarded for your speed and accuracy. Take the age-old test of dedication and bravery by facing your challengers in face-to-face mortal combat. In this PC-only game, use the arrow keys or WASD to walk away from your opponent, then rapidly turn around a press a number from 0-9 to get the kill! Good luck compadre! This game was created by Caleb Magee.
